channel.title: Open-Source on Letters From Iman
channel.description: Recent content in Open-Source on Letters From Iman

item.title: The Evolutions of Git Commit Message Conventions in Kurio
item.description: We in Kurio use Github as our version control system. And because of that, we also have a flow like open source project does.

item.title: Today I Learned - Checkout to Pull Request in GitHub Public Repository
item.description: So today I learned a really important thing in Github and open-source world :D. Started from a few months ago, I make a simple library here: https://github.com/bxcodec/faker. This library is helping the Go engineer to create a dummy data based on their structs.

item.title: Today I Learned: Making a Simple Interactive Shell Application in Golang
item.description: So today, I learn something new and a bit of basic thing in Golang. It was making a simple interactive shell. It was just a very simple application, but it kinda looks cool to make it.
